name: Google Docs Sync
description:
Sync rich text with formatting from Google Docs directly into your Figma file. Easy automation to format any text in Figma.


Advanced Feature: Sync parts of the document into multiple frames at the same time


// This is not an official plugin created by Google • It is simply created with ❤️ by Surbhi Gupta //


STEP 1

Create a Figma frame where you need Google Docs rich text


STEP 2

Write your text using styles, bullets, custom font sizes, italic etc in Google Docs.


STEP 3

Share the doc with “anyone on the web with the link”

Why: Current API limitations do not allow accessing private documents.


STEP 4

Make sure to select a Figma frame (or multiple frames) and run the plugin


### ADVANCED USAGE ###

https://bit.ly/2ZBQY0Q

### END ADVANCED USAGE ###


|**********************************************

| Documentation at https://bit.ly/3e5gYXR

|***********************************************


SUPPORTED FORMATTING

At this time, the following formats in Google Docs are supported

* Headings

* Bullets

* Custom Font Sizes

* Bold, Italic, Strikethrough


COMING SOON

* Numbered Lists

* Color
